description.zh-CN: 一个分步用户引导组件，用于在聚焦的覆盖层中展示产品功能和工作流程。包含智能高亮、步骤导航和交互式提示，适用于新手引导和功能介绍。
description.en-US: A step-by-step user guidance component for displaying product features and workflows in a focused overlay interface. Features smart highlighting, step navigation, and interactive tooltips for onboarding and feature introduction.

description.zh-CN: 默认的引导教程实现，具有清晰的步骤指示、聚光灯效果和流畅的过渡动画。有效引导用户了解界面功能，提供直观的导航控件和专业外观。
description.en-US: Default tour guide variant with step-by-step visual guidance, spotlight effects, and smooth transitions. Effectively guides users through interface features with intuitive navigation controls and professional appearance.
